General.Name: AB Vilkyskiu pienine
General.Description: AB Vilkyskiu pienine, together with its subsidiaries, engages in production and sale of dairy products in Lithuania, rest of the European Union, and internationally. The company operates through three segments: Cheese, Cheese Products and Other; Dry Milk Products; and Fresh Milk Products. It offers fermented, mozzarella, mould, smoked, melt, cottage, and other cheese products. The company also provides whey protein concentrates, skim milk powders, permeate, and whey powders, as well as raw milk, kefir, sour cream, yogurts, glazed curd bars, and butter. In addition, it leases buildings. The company was incorporated in 1993 and is headquartered in Vilky"kiai, Lithuania.
